content:
Beach combing feels like panning for gold in big waves,
you never know what's hiding under the reef rocks,
but whatever you catch is treasure~

Are you going tidepooling now?
Some shore-dwellers are really quick, like crabs,
so you'll need a bit of patience~

Hmm... Are you also getting lost in the joy of beach combing?
I never knew the shallows could be this fun beyond just splashing in the waves.
Go on, enjoy yourself~
